overview.title: Smart Key: Fast Access to Apps
overview.text: Single/Double tap to access to pre-set apps and shortcut functions, long press to get access to Google Search and Google Voice.

overview.title: Fingerprint sensor
overview.text: Cutting edge technology:a sensor detects a fingerprint, applied at any angle, and the lowest rate of release of the smartphone – 0.5 seconds. Self-learning algorithm:The more you unlock the smartphone, the faster the detection is triggered the next time. Touch Control:use the fingerprint scanner as an additional control: Move your finger down to open the notifications panel, double-tap will remove the extra notification. The sensor can be a button for shooting photos, receive a call or turn off the alarm. Close the information from prying eyes:3 levels of protection: normal, “guest” and protected by all.

overview.title: Elegant design with innovative features
overview.text: Ergonomic metallic body that fits perfectly with your hand, combining compact size with 5.2 inch big display. Perfection in Details: The dented power button with CD texture provides a visual experience compareable to precision watches. Body with ceramic sand blasting, delight to the touch.

overview.title: Super Camera 20MP
overview.text: Capture the best moments of your life with Honor 7’s 20MP rear-facing camera which features 0.1 seconds PDAF fast-focusing technology. Noise reduction: Features a ARM GPU OpenCL that helps to reduce noise in your images. Sapphire lens for the rear camera, offering impeccable wear-resisting and anti-scratch performance.

overview.title: Capture beautiful moments with ultimate creativity
overview.text: Take perfect selfie with honor 7’s 8MP front-facing camera soft lighting, a 26 mm wide angle lens and the unique 10-level beauty mode. Second generation SLR-level independent ISP and personalised filter function bringing stunning photo quality. Food mode help you create your own unique filter to enrich the photos taken and make the pictures of food more attractive. Special time-lapse mode, panorama and four key photo-taking scenes (light painting, taillight track, silky water and star track).

overview.title: An optimal 5.2-inch Full HD Screen
overview.text: An optimal 5.2-inch display with screen-to-body ratio of 76.7% and 423 PPI, give you ultimate HD visual experience. Brighter, clearer and genuine images: It features a 1500:1 high contrastratio with The RGLED technology , 50% higher than that of regular displays and high color saturation rate at 85% (NTSC). Features the brand-new display effect optimization and the power saving technologies, keeping vivid colors while consuming less power.

overview.title: 3100 mAh battery
overview.text: The smartphone is equipped with a 3100 mAh battery with a record high density of 600 Wh / l. SmartPower 3.0 technology saves up to 30% of energy through the hardware and software optimization. The smartphone automatically pauses unused but running applications, saving energy and increasing performance. Light users: Up to 60 hours Heavy users: Up to 30 hours

overview.title: Revolutionary Thermal Design: Keep Your Honor 7 Cool
overview.text: The back cover is made of aluminum alloy – heat dissipates significantly better compared to plastic casings. L-architecture: internal components are arranged around the battery, which leads to a uniform distribution of the heating elements and contributes to the rapid cooling. Processing of the internal components of the smartphone special gel improves thermal conduction and reduces power consumption by 15%. Achieved a decrease in heating by 40% during the games.

overview.title: True Honor comes from the inside
overview.text: The performance and power consumption are perfectly balanced by using up to 2.2GHz HiSilicon Kirin 935 chip with the integration of the big LITTLE architecture and the smart octa-core heterogeneous algorithm. i3 motion processor + Sensor Hub technology to ensure faster response and lower power consumption. All-sided security:Integrates a security feature 2.0 which isolates the Android OS from security OS; HiSEE security solution that provides all-sided protection.

overview.title: Premium Signal at Anytime: Our Dedication to Communication
overview.text: Intelligent, seamless switch of upper and bottom antennas, solving the “Dead Hold”problem. In case of poor signal strength, the smartphone switches to the antenna providing the best signal recept. In this case there is no additional energy consumption towards signal enhancement.

overview.title: Voice control: do what you say
overview.text: Find and wake-up your honor 7: Find your phone using pre-set voice wakeup command. You can customize the wakeup keyword.To make a call without unlocking the screen.

overview.title: Smart EMUI 3.1 Ultimate Experience: Elegant, Easy, Enjoy, Efficient
overview.text: 3D Dynamic UI: The new 3D UI 2.0 user interface enables super-fluent transitions and effects. Draw to fast access to apps: Fast access to apps by pre-set and customizable drawing. Fast snapshot: Double click on the down volume button to take a snapshot of every exciting moment. Hide private apps: Spread two fingers apart along the diagonals of the screen to add applications you want to hide.

overview.title: Infrared Remote-control with Smart Control 3.0
overview.text: Independent IR remote chip with preinstalled IR code libraries from global industry-leading manufacturers, can be used without any network connections. Revolutionary Smart Control 3.0 that enables you to control your TV, STB, DVD, air-conditioner, and other devices matched in the IR code libraries.

specification.title: Display
text: Size : 5.2 inches (~72.4% screen-to-body ratio), IPS-NEO LCD capacitive touchscreen
Resolution: 1080 x 1920 pixels (~424 ppi pixel density)

specification.title: CPU
text: Quad-core 2.2 GHz Cortex-A53 & quad-core 1.5 GHz Cortex-A53

specification.title: Operation System
text: Android OS, v5.0 (Lollipop), planned upgrade to v6.0 (Marshmallow) + Emotion UI 3.1

specification.title: Network
text: HSDPA+ (up to 42 Mbit/s DL/5.76 Mbit/s UL)

specification.title: Connectivity
text: Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, dual-band, WiFi Direct, hotspot

specification.title: Audio
text: Audio Codec: MP3, MIDI, AMR-NB, AAC, AAC+, eAAC+, WMA2-9, RA, PCM, OGG, FLAC

specification.title: Video
text: Video formats: H.265, H.263, H.264, MPEG-4, RV7-10, Xvid, VP8, WMV9
